Class Player

public class Player
extends Fighter

The player class that is stored in memory on the server.

Constructor Detail

Player

public Player(java.lang.String name,
              int playerClass)
Creates the player on the server. Either through create a new player, or from loading it from database. Player will be held in memory until logoff.

Parameters:
name - The name of the player.
playerClass - The class of the player. 1 = Fighter 2 = Wizard
